mapper.select: SELECT a.REQUST_ID , a.OCCRRNC_DE , a.SVC_NM , a.METHOD_NM , a.PROCESS_SE_CODE , c.CODE_NM AS PROCESS_SE_CODE_NM , a.PROCESS_TIME , a.RQESTER_IP , a.RQESTER_ID , b.MBER_NM AS RQESTER_NM FROM TH_FEIS_SYSLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_FEIS_GNRLMBER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_FEIS_DETAILCODE c ON a.PROCESS_SE_CODE = c.CODE WHERE c.CODE_ID = 'FEI033' AND a.REQUST_ID = #{requstId}

SELECT a.REQUST_ID , a.OCCRRNC_DE , a.SVC_NM , a.METHOD_NM , a.PROCESS_SE_CODE , c.CODE_NM AS PROCESS_SE_CODE_NM , a.PROCESS_TIME , a.RQESTER_IP , a.RQESTER_ID , b.MBER_NM AS RQESTER_NM FROM TH_FEIS_SYSLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_FEIS_GNRLMBER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_FEIS_DETAILCODE c ON a.PROCESS_SE_CODE = c.CODE WHERE c.CODE_ID = 'FEI033'
AND (LOWER(b.MBER_NM) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')) OR LOWER(a.METHOD_NM) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')))
AND LOWER(b.MBER_NM) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%'))
AND (LOWER(a.METHOD_NM) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')))
AND c.CODE = #{processSeCode}
AND a.OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(#{searchBgnDe},' 00:00:00'), 'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(#{searchEndDe},' 23:59:59'), 'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY a.OCCRRNC_DE DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(a.REQUST_ID) as cnt FROM TH_FEIS_SYSLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_FEIS_GNRLMBER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_FEIS_DETAILCODE c ON a.PROCESS_SE_CODE = c.CODE WHERE c.CODE_ID = 'FEI033'
AND (LOWER(b.MBER_NM) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')) OR LOWER(a.METHOD_NM) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')))
AND LOWER(b.MBER_NM) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%'))
AND (LOWER(a.METHOD_NM) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')))
AND c.CODE = #{processSeCode}
AND a.OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(#{searchBgnDe},' 00:00:00'), 'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(#{searchEndDe},' 23:59:59'), 'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS')

SELECT a.REQUST_ID , TO_CHAR(a.OCCRRNC_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS OCCRRNC_DE , a.SVC_NM , a.METHOD_NM , a.PROCESS_SE_CODE , c.CODE_NM AS PROCESS_SE_CODE_NM , a.PROCESS_TIME , a.RQESTER_IP , A.RQESTER_ID , b.MBER_NM AS RQESTER_NM FROM TH_FEIS_SYSLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_FEIS_GNRLMBER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_FEIS_DETAILCODE c ON a.PROCESS_SE_CODE = c.CODE WHERE c.CODE_ID = 'FEI033'
AND (LOWER(b.MBER_NM) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')) OR LOWER(a.METHOD_NM) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')))
AND LOWER(b.MBER_NM) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%'))
AND (LOWER(a.METHOD_NM) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')))
AND c.CODE = #{processSeCode}
AND a.OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(#{searchBgnDe},' 00:00:00'), 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(#{searchEndDe},' 23:59:59'), 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY a.OCCRRNC_DE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TH_FEIS_SYSLOGSUMMARY SELECT TO_CHAR(b.OCCRRNC_DE, 'YYYYmmdd' ) , b.SVC_NM , b.METHOD_NM , SUM(CASE WHEN b.PROCESS_SE_CODE = 'C' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CREAT_CO , SUM(CASE WHEN b.PROCESS_SE_CODE = 'U' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS UPDT_CO , SUM(CASE WHEN b.PROCESS_SE_CODE = 'R' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS RDCNT , SUM(CASE WHEN b.PROCESS_SE_CODE = 'D' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DELETE_CO , 0 AS OUTPT_CO , 0 AS ERROR_CO FROM TH_FEIS_SYSLOG b WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT c.OCCRRNC_DE FROM TH_FEIS_SYSLOGSUMMARY c WHERE c.OCCRRNC_DE = TO_CHAR(NOW() - interval '1 day', 'YYYYmmdd') ) AND TO_CHAR(b.OCCRRNC_DE, 'YYYYmmdd' ) = TO_CHAR(NOW() - interval '1 day', 'YYYYmmdd') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(b.OCCRRNC_DE, 'YYYYmmdd' ) , b.SVC_NM , b.METHOD_NM
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TH_FEIS_SYSLOG WHERE TO_CHAR(OCCRRNC_DE, 'YYYYmmdd') < TO_CHAR(NOW() - interval '6 month', 'YYYYmmdd')
